replies.message:
^ Agreed
On a second thought, he actually had a worse song than this... called "FACK"
I'm sure he was on drugs when he wrote it lol

* LETZTE Chance für alle deutschen Eminem-Fans! *

► Sichert euch HIER die letzten "The Marshall Mathers LP 2" Deluxe Edt.: http://amzn.to/17pEHiq

Es wird keine Nachpressung geben!

I think he needs to make at least 4 new songs in 6 months that we can sing along too, I like the new album but I don't feel like singing along and the best thing about most of his older stuff I can sing it..and ppl like some in complicated stuff that flowers over notes and naturally you just know where the song is going..I like bezerk cause its not personal and it has a lot of energy and at its best when done live..monster is okay but when I hear an Eminem so g usually I skip over the hooks get to the point when he starts the song out you move into the groove of it faster...I'm glad he cleared some things up in the MMP its an original album he never sounds like anybody belts no matter what he does and he should be proud of it and hopefully get at a couple songs that are basic and simple..last thing he needs to do is prove himself or explain himself he used to do stuff like rock the bells and let me clear my throat on those kinda beats and his energy is awesome good album a lot of work..I know!!
you're cute, so you can have one
obviously its not authentic! But if you only make 1k of them then how else are you supposed to get 1!
